    • Reading joy made easy

    Our monthly reading club makes reading more joyful and less stressful for both kids and parents.

    Get Started

    You want your child to love reading.

    We can help with that.

    Great Books

    In order to enjoy reading, kids need to read the right books—the best books for them. We help them find those books.

    Skills & Tools

    Kids should feel empowered in their reading life. We provide them with opportunities & tools to develop the skills they need to do so.

    Sharing

    Sharing books with others takes the reading experience to the next level. We help kids grow together as they read together.

    Parent Tools

    You are a huge part of your child’s reading journey. We’re here to help you, too. You’ll be ready to be your child’s personal librarian in no time.

    How Bookmark's Reading Clubs Work

    Pick an Age Group. We have clubs for pre-k through 6th grade, with middle school and high school coming soon!

    Delivered to Your Inbox Monthly. Each subscription is delivered straight to your inbox monthly. You’ll have access to all of the materials forever!

    Let the Reading Love Begin! Our clubs are help each age group find more joy in reading & develop lifelong habits that help them grow into strong readers.
